org.apache.giraph.time

接口 Time

  • 所有已知实现类:
    FakeTime, SystemTime

    public interface Time
    Interface for handling Time related operations so that they can be mocked for testing.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static long MS_PER_DAY
      Milliseconds per day
      static long MS_PER_HOUR
      Milliseconds per hour
      static long MS_PER_SECOND
      Milliseconds per second

      Milliseconds per second (as float)

      Nanoseconds per millisecond
      static long NS_PER_SECOND
      Nanoseconds per second

      Nanoseconds per second (as float)

      Nanoseconds per microsecond

      Seconds per day

    • 方法详细资料

      • getMilliseconds

        long getMilliseconds()
        Get the current milliseconds
        返回:
        The difference, measured in milliseconds, between the current time and midnight, January 1, 1970 UTC.

      • getMicroseconds

        long getMicroseconds()
        Get the current microseconds
        返回:
        The difference, measured in microseconds, between the current time and midnight, January 1, 1970 UTC.

      • getNanoseconds

        long getNanoseconds()
        Get the current nanoseconds
        返回:
        The difference, measured in nanoseconds, between the current time and midnight, January 1, 1970 UTC.

      • getSeconds

        int getSeconds()
        Get the current seconds
        返回:
        The difference, measured in seconds, between the current time and midnight, January 1, 1970 UTC.

      • getCurrentDate

        Date getCurrentDate()
        Get the current date
        返回:
        Current date

      • sleep

        void sleep(long milliseconds)
           throws InterruptedException
        Current thread should sleep for some number of milliseconds.
        参数:
        milliseconds - Milliseconds to sleep for
        抛出:
        InterruptedException
